import React from "react"; import { useRef, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import useAuth from '../hooks/useAuth'; import { Link, useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from '../api/axios'; import FloatingImage from './Functions/FloatingImage' const LOGIN_URL = '/Login'; const Login = () => { const { setAuth } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const from = location.state?.from?.pathname || "/"; const userRef = useRef(); const errRef = useRef(); const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [errMsg, setErrMsg] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { userRef.current.focus(); }, []) useEffect(() => { setErrMsg(''); }, [email, pass]) return ( <>
